    • Method Detail

      • checkMCInProperState

        public java.lang.Boolean checkMCInProperState()
        checks if MCs are in the proper state(online/offline) if MCs are in any other state, waits for maximum of 1 hr 45 mins by checking MC status every 3 minutes.
        Returns:
        - true if MCs are in proper state other wise false

      • checkIfAllMCsOnline

        public int checkIfAllMCsOnline()
        Update allMCsUp to true if all MCs are online
        Returns:
        - 0 if smtool is successful and 1 for failure

      • generateMCExclusionList

        public java.lang.Boolean generateMCExclusionList()
        Generates MC exclusion list
        Returns:
        true for success and false for failure
